history.proof: intros m x y H1 H2. unfold eqs. intros z. split. - intros H3. hauto lq: on use: expo_eq_exds_orb, expo_symm, expo_exd, expo_trans unfold: expo. - qauto use: expo_eq_exds_orb, expo_trans, expo_exd unfold: expo.

original: intros m x y H1 H2. unfold eqs. intros z. split. - intros H3. unfold expo in H2. destruct H2 as [H2a H2b]. specialize (H2b z). destruct H2b as [i H2b]. rewrite H2b. apply incls_orbit with (m := m) (x := x); auto. - intros H3. unfold expo in H2. destruct H2 as [H2a H2b]. specialize (H2b z). destruct H2b as [i H2b]. rewrite <- H2b. apply incls_orbit with (m := m) (x := y); auto.
